definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
to name sth after a person/named after/eponymous
under one's own name/named after oneself

sentences.english: Names in this story have been changed to protect the interviewees.
sentences.chinese: 這篇報道中的人名都被改了，以保護被採訪人。

sentences.english: There are many names of people mentioned in the Baoshan Bamboo Strips of Chu state.
sentences.chinese: 包山楚簡中所涉及的人名很多。

sentences.english: The men listed above by name were leaders of their clans. Their families increased greatly
sentences.chinese: 以上所記的人名都是作族長的，他們宗族的人數增多。

sentences.english: Some of the names in the report have been blanked out.
sentences.chinese: 報告中的一些人名已被勾掉了。

sentences.english: The latter two eponymic lesions have specific causes.
sentences.chinese: 最後兩個以人名命名的病變有其特殊的原因。

sentences.english: All persons and places mentioned are carefully indexed.
sentences.chinese: 所有被提及的人名和地名都仔細編入索引中。

sentences.english: These mentioned by their names were princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.
sentences.chinese: 以上所記的人名都是作族長的，他們宗族的人數增多。

sentences.english: Actually Gou Yao is the name of a person?
Say you need the names sorted by their associated revenues.
sentences.chinese: 假定您需要按照他們的相關收入對人名進行排序。

sentences.english: The Chinese versions of the name terms in medical English have been confusing for their unstandardized translation.
sentences.chinese: 醫學英語中人名冠名術語的漢譯缺乏統一標準。

sentences.english: So here are some quotes by famous people which remind you of who you are.
sentences.chinese: 所以在此獻上一些名人名言以此提醒你你是誰。

sentences.english: I'm not good at remembering names.
Write down who you need to talk to and an order for meeting or calling them.
sentences.chinese: 把你需要與之討論的人名寫下來，預約採訪或打電話。

sentences.english: The problem of a single name for several persons is avoided but can not be eliminated in the person-naming.
sentences.chinese: 重名是人名命名中一個儘量避免而又無法消除的問題。

sentences.english: Supervisors' roster and minutes of supervisors' meeting.
sentences.chinese: 七監察人名冊及監察人會議紀錄。

sentences.english: It's so hard for me to remember names.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，要記住人名太困難了。

definition: false name/pseudonym/alias/pen name/the Japanese kana scripts/hiragana 平假名[ping2 jia3 ming2] and katakana 片假名[pian4 jia3 ming2]
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
single Chinese character/word (in a foreign language)
clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document)/entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
